messages.subject: OT: Vote for the Milk Of Human Kindness!
messages.msgSnippet: This is a very cool grass-roots project making some real changes and worthy of support. You can only vote today. Pass it on! Good News Everyone!... The Milk
messages.messageBody:
This is a very cool grass-roots project making some real changes and worthy
of support.
You can only vote today. Pass it on!

"Good News Everyone!...

The Milk Of Human Kindness Project has been honored as
the "Cool Site of the Day" for today, Feb. 15th, 2004.
That means that over 200,000 people will be informed
about the long-term social benefits of breastfeeding
and compassionate nurturing!

We can reach even more people if you help us get a
high score by clicking over to...

http://www.coolsiteoftheday.com/frmindex.html

...and casting your vote. Please vote 10 to offset the
effect of those who don't appreciate what we're about.
As of this writing, the score is about 5 with a slight
downward trend.

VOTING ENDS TONIGHT around 11pm, so please click that
link now! If you get this message too late, the link
above will take you to a different site, but you can
view the voting results at...

http://www.coolsiteoftheday.com/cgi-bin/stillcool.pl

Please forward this announcement to all your
pro-nursing friends and lists.

Thanks & Peace,

Scott Noelle & Emily Troper
MOHK Project Co-organizers
